items.title: Gold trading Strategy: Avoid large short positions; check key levels here
items.description: Spot gold at the time of the MCX closing was trading at $2624, up around 0.55 per cent on the day. The MCX December Gold contract at Rs 75,152 (LTP) was up nearly 0.30 per cent.

items.title: Silver strategy: Buy the dips; support at  Rs 87,500, resistance at 91,500
items.description: Surging US Dollar Index and tumbling bond prices are acting as headwinds for the metal as the US rate cut pace has become somewhat uncertain in the short term. Dip buying is preferred.

items.title: Nifty: Will the market rally yet again as FIIs turn overtly bearish in F&O?

items.title: IREDA share price up 3% as Q2 profit climbs 36% YoY; details here
items.description: The state-owned company, on Thursday, reported a 36 per cent rise in profit after tax, reaching Rs 387.7 crore for the September quarter (Q2FY25), compared to Rs 284.7 crore in Q2FY24
